title: Compute Engine - Drivers for NVIDIA RTX Virtual Workstation (vWS)
abstract:
# Compute Engine - Drivers for NVIDIA RTX Virtual Workstation (vWS)
**Caution:** The drivers provided on this page are for use with Compute Engine only. If you need drivers for other platforms, see the [NVIDIA Driver Download](http://www.nvidia.com/Download/index.aspx) page.
This page provides a list of drivers that you can use for your [ NVIDIA RTX Virtual Workstations (vWS) (formerly known as NVIDIA GRID)](/compute/docs/gpus#gpu-virtual-workstations) that run on Compute Engine.
For instructions on how to install these drivers on your VM, see [Installing drivers for NVIDIA RTX Virtual Workstations (vWS)](/compute/docs/gpus/install-grid-drivers) .
content:
## Linux drivers
The following table list the URLs for the drivers that can be used for virtual workstations that run on Linux VMs on Compute Engine.
To review the recommended version for your GPU model, see [Required NVIDIA driver versions](/compute/docs/gpus/install-grid-drivers#minimum-driver) .
